4.1 out of 5 stars

Release date March 15, 2021
Language English
Manufacturer Spin Master

Price: $19.99 - $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:51 UTC – Details)


Bring the adventure to life with Jumanji The Game, the latest edition of the legendary board game. You and your band of brave adventurers suddenly find yourselves deep in a mysterious jungle full of secrets and surprises. Danger lies along your path, threatening to take away your 3 precious Life Tokens. Your goal is to reach Jumanji (the center) and call out its name, but beware: if any of your group runs out of Life Tokens, everyone loses! On each turn, roll dice and move along the path, using the Green Dome to reveal a riddle. Solve the riddle correctly and move an extra space. End your turn by drawing a Challenge card to see what difficulties Jumanji has in store for you. You might have to act out a story of your adventures, or race to solve a challenge. Be careful or you may lose a Life Token! Reach the center with at least one Life Token left per player and yell “JUMANJI!” – you’ve just won for the whole group! Jumanji The Game is the exciting adventure game to play with friends and family on your next game night. For 2 to 4 players, ages 8 and up
DO NOT BEGIN UNLESS YOU INTEND TO FINISH! Jumanji The Board Game takes you and your fellow adventurers on a quest through the jungle, solving riddles and completing challenges while trying not to lose your Life Tokens.
WORK TOGETHER, WIN TOGETHER: Each player races to be the first to reach the center of the jungle and yell “JUMANJI!” to win. But if ANY player loses all their Life Tokens, ALL players lose!
SOLVE RIDDLES AND CHALLENGES: Each turn delivers new riddles to solve and challenges to complete. Escape dangers, race against the clock, and tell exciting stories to keep moving forward!
SPIN MASTER PUZZLES, TOYS & GAMES: A world of jigsaw puzzles and the best family board games for kids, teens, and adults. Plus strategy games, card games, and classic board games like dominoes, mahjong, chess, or a backgammon set.
FUN FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY: Next time you get together with family and friends, bring along a Spin Master game. The perfect activity for memorable game nights, birthdays, dinner parties, vacations, holiday & Christmas gifts, and any time you just want to have fun!

JUMANJI

THE GAME

On each turn, roll dice and move along the path, using the Green Dome to reveal a riddle. Solve the riddle correctly and move an extra space. End your turn by drawing a Challenge card to see what difficulties Jumanji has in store for you.

BE PREPARED

You might have to act out a story of your adventures, or race to solve a challenge. Be careful or you may lose a Life Token!

PLAY FOR YOUR LIFE

Reach the center with at least one Life Token left per player and yell “JUMANJI!” – you’ve just won for the whole group! Jumanji The Game is the exciting adventure game to play with friends and family on your next game night.

QUICK FACTS

  • Based on the Movie!
  • 2 to 4 Players
  • Ages 8 and up

Read more

JUMANJI COMES TO REAL LIFE

Bring the adventure to life with Jumanji The Game, the latest edition of the legendary board game. In this game, you must work together to win together!

DO NOT BEGIN…

You and your band of brave adventurers suddenly find yourselves deep in a mysterious jungle full of secrets and surprises. Danger lies along your path, threatening to take away your Life Tokens.

UNLESS YOU INTEND TO FINISH

Your goal is to reach Jumanji (the center) and call out its name, but beware: if any of your group runs out of Life Tokens, everyone loses!

Read more

GAME INCLUDES

1 Gameboard, 1 Green Dome Unit, 100 Challenge Cards, 4 Rhino Movers, 12 Life Tokens, 2 Regular Dice, 4 Challenge Dice, 1 Sand Timer, Instructions

Read more



Jumanji Deluxe Game, Immersive Electronic Version
Jumanji The Game Action Game
Jumanji 3 The Next Level, Falcon Jewel Battle
Jumanji Escape Room Game
Players 2-4 players 2-4 players 2-4 players 3-5 players
Ages 8 and up 5 and up 8 and up 10 and up
About Press the electronic Green Dome and hear the beating drums of Jumanji. Look inside — mysterious riddles and dangerous events magically appear. Adventurers beware: do not begin unless you intend to finish Experience the wild ride of the third Jumanji movie, The Next Level, in a fast-paced dice rolling game! You’ve got 60 minutes to decipher the codes that will set you free in these exciting games of adventure.

item.title: North Edge Apache Men’s Sports Watches for Outdoor Tactical Survival Adventure Hiking，EL Backlight，5ATM waterproof，with Military Army Altimeter Barometer，Pedometer，Pacer，Digital Wrist Watch，Large Dial
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) My team members are very passionate about outdoor sports, we often go fishing, mountain climbing, hiking, biking, outdoor tactical survival adventures, etc. together. However, nothing is 100% predictable, on the way, we encountered many contingencies such as broken compass in the jungle, sudden drop in temperature, non-waterproof watches not working, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $79.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 05:08:58 UTC – Details)


My team members are very passionate about outdoor sports, we often go fishing, mountain climbing, hiking, biking, outdoor tactical survival adventures, etc. together. However, nothing is 100% predictable, on the way, we encountered many contingencies such as broken compass in the jungle, sudden drop in temperature, non-waterproof watches not working, inability to measure distance traveled and forgetting to bring Altimeter and Barometer etc. We all love watches, so our designer Jake designed this multifunctional outdoor sports watch with a large dial and large numbers.It’s a cool great companion.
We calibrated the compass before sending. We have carefully prepared a graphical version of the manual for you to make it easier for you to use the functions of the watch.
Function :
1. Altimeter (altitude trend chart and climb rate)      
2. Barometer ( air pressure trend chart)
3. Compass             4. Thermometer         5. Weather Forecast  
6. Pedometer, step counter, calorie, distance record
7. Time functions: hour, minute, second, year(2000-2099), month, date, weekday,
8. Alarm clock (2 sets alarm clock, )       
9. Countdown timer (99:59:59~0)       10. Stopwatch (0~:59:59),
11. Worldtime functions (daylight saving time switch automatically)
12. Corporates digital compass, altimeter, barometer, Thermometer, air pressure trend and altitude trend and altitude trend
13. Button tone on or off
14. Battery life remind
15. EL Backlight
Case Thickness# 14mm       Water Resistance Depth #50m
Style#Sport Item                   Type# Digital Wrist watches
Dial Diameter#50mm           Band Material Type#nylon strap
Band Length #25cm              Band color#Black、Blue、Green                
(In-kind shooting, we try to restore the true color, but due to different lighting conditions and viewing angle of the display device, everyone’s feeling of color may be different, please refer to the actual object received)
Package Include: Watch X1, manual X1,  a black square gift box. 
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 4.09 x 4.02 x 2.99 inches; 8.78 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ Apache
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 CR2032 batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ April 1, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ North Edge-Apache
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09X14KH3T
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Material & Size: Dial Window #Tempered Glass, Watch Case #Stainless Steel, Watch Band #Nylon Band, Japanese battery #CR2032 18 months life. Case Size: Diameter #50.0mm/1.96”,Thickness #16mm/0.63”. Weight #117g/0.258lbs.
Usage: Suitable For indoor/outdoor sports or daily use freely, tactical training, running, hiking, swimming, fishing, climbing, cycling, Tactical Survival adventure etc.
Note: The Military tactical Watch has a big watch face with large numbers, watch weigh may feel heavier. Please Keep away from hot water and water vapor. Best to automatically or manually calibrate the various functions of the watch before use.
Great technology, Great looking watch with great features, Beautiful designer, Nice size. Package Include: Watch X1, manual X1, a black square gift box. Please contact us if you have any questions.
Band.Length: 260.0 Millimeters
Clasp type: Push Button Deployment Clasp
Item shape: Round

4
Price: $79.99
